meanings.definition: A red dye obtained from the roots of plants in the madder family.
meanings.sent1: The alizarin dye gave the fabric a vibrant red color.
meanings.sent2: Artists often use alizarin to create beautiful red hues in their paintings.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel accidentally spilled alizarin dye all over the forest floor.
meanings.sent4: Her cheeks flushed with embarrassment, resembling the deep red of alizarin.
meanings.sent5: The alizarin dye seeped into the fabric, leaving a permanent mark.

meanings.definition: A red pigment used in paints and dyes.
meanings.sent1: The alizarin pigment added a rich red tone to the artwork.
meanings.sent2: Textile manufacturers rely on alizarin for its vibrant red color.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous artist accidentally spilled alizarin pigment all over the canvas.
meanings.sent4: The sunset painted the sky with hues reminiscent of alizarin.
meanings.sent5: The alizarin pigment blended seamlessly with the other colors, creating a stunning masterpiece.
